sentences.en: After the storm we were without electricity for five days.
sentences.cn: 暴风雨之后我们断电了五天。

sentences.en: Almost without exception those convicted were our friends and colleagues.
sentences.cn: 那些被判有罪的人几乎无一例外都是我们的朋友和同事。

sentences.en: Captain Cook safely navigated his ship without accident for 100 voyages.
sentences.cn: 库克船长驾驶的船安全出航100次无事故。

sentences.en: He has said he will fire editorial employees without regard to seniority.
sentences.cn: 他说过不管资历如何，任何编辑人员他都有可能解雇。

sentences.en: I can lose a few pounds without resorting to daft diets.
sentences.cn: 我不用疯狂地节食也能减轻几磅。

sentences.en: I will return, find you, love you, marry you and live without shame.
sentences.cn: 我会回去，找到你，爱你，娶你，活的光明正大。《赎罪》

sentences.en: I’m getting used to managing without a car.
sentences.cn: 我已经习惯没有汽车了。

sentences.en: It is not possible to reposition the carpet without damaging it.
sentences.cn: 想要挪动地毯又不让它损坏是不可能的。

sentences.en: Murat had looked into the eyes of the firing squad without flinching.
sentences.cn: 穆拉特毫不退缩地直视着执行枪决的行刑队员们的眼睛。

sentences.en: Organic food is unadulterated food produced without artificial chemicals or pesticides.
sentences.cn: 有机食品是未使用人工化学制剂和杀虫剂的纯净食品。

sentences.en: Somehow he tells these stories without a note of horror.
sentences.cn: 不知为什么他讲这些故事时一点都不害怕。

sentences.en: The shooting of The Maltese Falcon proceeded without a hitch.
sentences.cn: 《马耳他之鹰》的拍摄进展顺利。

sentences.en: Their water was turned off weeks ago without explanation.
sentences.cn: 他们的水在几周以前就毫无理由地被切断了。

sentences.en: They meant to finish her off, swiftly and without mercy.
sentences.cn: 他们打算毫不留情地迅速结果了她。

sentences.en: We passed two ruined abbeys, one with a tower and one without.
sentences.cn: 我们路过两座破落的寺院，一座有塔楼，另一座没有。

sentences.en: When life gets hard and you want to give up, remember that life is full of ups and downs, and without the downs, the ups would mean nothing.
sentences.cn: 当生活很艰难，你想要放弃的时候，请记住，生活充满了起起落落，如果没有低谷，那站在高处也失去了意义。

sentences.en: When your children misbehave tell them without making them feel small.
sentences.cn: 孩子表现不佳时要让他们知道，但不能让他们自惭形秽。

sentences.en: You can't have one without the other, as the song says.
sentences.cn: 就像歌里唱的那样，两者密不可分，不能只取其一。

words.tran_cn: 户外；在外面；没有或不显示某事物

trans.tran_cn: 缺乏，没有，不用，不和…一起，在没有(发生或做某事)的情况下
trans.tran_en: not having something, especially something that is basic or necessary
